examples.example: 我打算在假期里学习一门新技能，提升自己。

translate.english: I plan to learn a new skill during the holiday to improve myself.

examples.example: 我打算在未来的日子里努力奋斗，实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: I plan to strive hard in the days to come to realize my dream.

examples.example: 我打算从现在开始每天坚持锻炼，保持健康的身体。

translate.english: I plan to insist on exercising every day from now on to keep a healthy body.
